name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.scheduler.heartbeat.interval-ms
relevant log: 1-ERROR	ERROR IN CONTACTING RM.java.io.InterruptedIOException: Call interrupted
explanation: The error log indicates an issue with contacting the ResourceManager. The configuration option 'yarn.app.mapreduce.am.scheduler.heartbeat.interval-ms' is related to the frequency of heartbeats sent to the ResourceManager. If the interval is too short, it may cause excessive network traffic and interruptions.

name: dfs.client.cached.conn.retry
relevant log: 1-ERROR	ERROR IN CONTACTING RM.java.io.InterruptedIOException: Call interrupted
explanation: The error log shows an interrupted I/O exception, which could be due to issues with the client's connection retries. The configuration option 'dfs.client.cached.conn.retry' determines the number of times the HDFS client will pull a socket from the cache before trying to create a new socket. If this value is too low, it may cause connection interruptions.

name: yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory.cgroups.swappiness
relevant log: 1-ERROR	ERROR IN CONTACTING RM.java.io.InterruptedIOException: Call interrupted
explanation: The error log indicates an issue with contacting the ResourceManager. The configuration option 'yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory.cgroups.swappiness' is related to the memory management of the NodeManager. If the value is too low, it may cause memory shortage and thus interrupt the communication with the ResourceManager.
